description.value:
The purchase of slaves from the Alien Stryxis, who simply refer to them as "Meat". These slaves can perform basic labour and utterly obedient by neccisity.

Requirements

Dealing with the Alien Stryxis Rarely just requires an Acquisition Roll, and may require other, stranger costsâ€¦

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
